com.biorecorder.edflib.util

Class PhysicalDigitalConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biorecorder.edflib.util.PhysicalDigitalConverter

  • public class PhysicalDigitalConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to convert physical (floating point) value to digital (integer) and physical DataRecord to digital DataRecord and vice versa.

    EDF/BDF format assumes a linear relationship between physical and digital values, and the scaling factor (gain) for every channel is calculated on the base of the physical minimum and maximum and the corresponding digital minimum and maximum specified for each channel (see SignalConfig). So:

    (physValue - physMin) / (digValue - digMin) = constant [Gain] = (physMax - physMin) / (digMax - digMin)

    physValue = digValue * gain + offset
    digValue = (physValue - offset) / gain

    where:
    gain = (physMax - physMin) / (digMax - digMin)
    offset = (physMin - digMin * gain);

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • digitalRecordToPhysical

        public double[] digitalRecordToPhysical(int[] digArray,
                                        int digArrayOffset)
        Convert digital DataRecord to physical. Digital DataRecord are taken from digArray starting at digArrayOffset position.
        Parameters:
        digArray - array with digital data
        digArrayOffset - offset within the array at which the digital DataRecord starts
        Returns:
        physical DataRecord

      • gainCalibrationFactor

        public static double gainCalibrationFactor(double physMax,
                                           double physMin,
                                           int digMax,
                                           int digMin)
        This static method calculate the gain calibration (adjust) factor on the base of physical and digital maximums and minimums
        Parameters:
        physMax - physical maximum
        physMin - physical minimum
        digMax - digital maximum
        digMin - digital minimum
        Returns:
        gain = (physMax - physMin) / (digMax - digMin)

      • offsetCalibrationFactor

        public static double offsetCalibrationFactor(double physMax,
                                             double physMin,
                                             int digMax,
                                             int digMin)
        This static method calculate the offset calibration (adjust) factor on the base of physical and digital maximums and minimums
        Parameters:
        physMax - physical maximum
        physMin - physical minimum
        digMax - digital maximum
        digMin - digital minimum
        Returns:
        offset = (physMin - digMin * gain) where gain = (physMax - physMin) / (digMax - digMin)
